item.title: Auriza add a quote by Steve Jobs
item.description: "Details matter, it's worth waiting to get it right." -- Steve Jobs

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Steve Jobs
Auriza add a quote by Steve Jobs
item.description: "Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it’s worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains." -- Steve Jobs

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Steve Jobs (attributed)
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication-- Steve Jobs turned this into the slogan behind an early Mac advertising campaign. Which doesn't make it less true." -- Steve Jobs (attributed)

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Steve Jobs
item.description: "people don't know what they want until you show it to them." -- Steve Jobs

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Steve Jobs
item.description: "When you’re a carpenter making a beautiful chest of drawers, you’re not going to use a piece of plywood on the back, even though it faces the wall and nobody will ever see it. You’ll know it’s there, so you’re going to use a beautiful piece of wood on the back. For you to sleep well at night, the aesthetic, the quality, has to be carried all the way through." -- Steve Jobs

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Mies van der Rohe
item.description: "Less is more." -- Mies van der Rohe

item.title: Auriza add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up." -- Pablo Picasso
